message.body: Tried calling but got your voicemail. I'm at the bowling alley if you want to stop by or meet after or something
My phone died over night. will you still be there in a half hour?
I'll probably be about to leave by then. Want to meet up for lunch or something?
I am a member of the ###########. I don't think my phone can handle this. My map keeps cutting out durning training.
Oh no! Actually I think my friend ### had the same problem
Oh, it looks like other people have had success with force closing the app and then starting it again!
That was what I did but it went black again in the next training mission
That could possibly happen with a lousy data connection too
Ah well. I'm up for new phone/contact re up so maybe I'll stop at tmobile tomorrow
You know, that's interesting. Everyone I personally know who's had that problem has been on tmobile
On the upside, a new phone would also come with a charger! :-)
That's not much of an upside
I need to look into new cellar plans
A new phone would probably also have working buttons!
